name: Tabletop Dictator
description:
-HTML5 VERSION- The effect for pickup the cards is distorted and occasionally crashes to a black screen in the browser version so if you want the full experience download the executable.

Gain notoriety as a local dictator by assigning henchmen to tasks on cards.
Drag Henchmen into slots to assign them to the task and press the button to carry it out.
The more henchmen and the more skilled they are the better chance you have at succeeding on the quest.
Henchmen get tired after a quest and have to wait 3 turns to wake up.
The Boss doesn't get tired but can't be upgraded.
Upgrading a sleeping character also wakes them up.

Created in 1 Week for the GameDevNetwork: Gooseberry Jam

#Known Bugs#
More than 2 slots on a card overlap when they shouldn't
Sliding cards aren't properly sized leaving parts of the card uncovered
HTML5 about page and holding card effect distorted

Credits:
Ben Flavell - Lead Developer and Designer
Emily Duff - Visual Design Consultant
Michael Flavell - Writing Consultant
